description:
OpenTTD is an open source remake and expansion of the 1995 Chris Sawyer video game Transport Tycoon Deluxe. It is an "urban planning and simulation game" in which the player aims to earn money through transportation of passengers and freight by land, water and air.

This is a port to webOS of the OpenTTD Version 1.1.1. For more information about the game visit http://openttd.org. If you have any questions / problems with this app / binary version please contact me, not the OpenTTD developers. Let me know any problems or suggestions: openttd -at- omoco _dot_ de

Known Problems & Bugs: No Sound, If the interface is too small for you, change the resolution in the settings to 800x600.
